name: WindowStateInsert
query:
insert into windows (time, isopen, room)
values ('{{{msg.payload.time}}}', {{{msg.payload.isopen}}}, '{{{msg.payload.room}}}')

name: DoorInsert
query:
insert into door (time, state, room)
values ('{{{msg.payload.time}}}', {{{msg.payload.state}}}, '{{{msg.payload.room}}}')

info: Check if any window is open while alarm is ON.
Check if any balcony or central or garage door is open while alarm is ON.

name: MotionStateInsert
query:
insert into motion (time, state, room)
values ('{{{msg.payload.time}}}', {{{msg.payload.state}}}, '{{{msg.payload.room}}}')

name: FridgeShow
query:
SELECT * FROM FridgeDoor
ORDER BY time;

name: Fridge Previous 10 min Value
check if door is open now
check if door was open and ten minutes ago

info: Select the latest record (10 min ago) from database and keep the state column, to check whether the fridge door is still open or not.

func:
msg.payload = 'The fridge door may be open for several minutes.'
return msg;
